title: How to optimize the route for more than 24 hours?
html_content:
Optimizing a route of more than 24 hours applies for orders with customers' location in far distance with the Depot and the delivery time is more than 24 hours.

1. Steps of optimizing an over-twenty-four-hour route in the Website.

1.1. Change the operation time of the customer and the vehicle (The open time, the close time) and make sure that longer than 24 hours.

Notice

  • A route for more than 24 hours will be planned based on the operation time of the vehicle.
    Example: As the Start time of the vehicle is at 20:00 and its Close time is 100:00, the route will be planned starting at 20:00.

2. How the drivers conduct tasks in the Mobile App.

  • The Driver conducts 3 tasks: Loading, Delivery, End day in the Mobile App.
    Example: The route plan in the website lasts in 2 days (26/01/2021 and 27/01/2021). The Mobile app will display 3 task including loading, delivery, end days in those 2 days.
